tool_description:
With the Roman Gods API, you can access information about gods such as Jupiter, the king of the gods, and his wife Juno, the goddess of marriage and childbirth. You can also learn about other prominent gods, such as Mars, the god of war, Venus, the goddess of love and beauty, and Mercury, the messenger of the gods.  

This API is ideal for anyone looking to build applications centered around ancient mythology, history, or culture. Whether you're developing a website, a mobile app, or a game, ...
title: Roman Gods By Pizza API

api_list.name: Search Roman God By Name
api_list.description: Search for a Roman God By name to get a description about them

api_list.name: Random Roman God
api_list.description: Returns information about a random Roman God
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://roman-gods-by-pizza-api.p.rapidapi.com/Roman-God"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "roman-gods-by-pizza-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
